title: Strictly Come Dancing, week 3 - Judi James on the body language. Sexy Michelle has a healthy lack of inhibitions; Karim needs to bring out his inner diva
text:
You know you’re in trouble on Strictly when they bring you in dangling off a wire like a turkey trussed up for Xmas. It’s the ultimate time-waster, meaning it keeps the leaden hoofing to a minimum. On week one, it was poor Anneka Rice strung up from the ceiling and last night she lost her first TV challenge by getting voted off the show.

This week saw both David James and Mike Bushell descend from the ceiling while their pro partners shimmied or show-boated happily on the dancefloor, so I’m guessing their days might be numbered too.

Anneka had clearly been put back in the ‘comedy turn’ box by partner Kevin Clifton this week after showing a glimmer of real dance potential with her waltz last...
description: You know you’re in trouble on Strictly when they bring you in dangling off a wire like a turkey trussed up for Xmas.
